tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fuel_consumption_data (
   vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
   fuel_type VARCHAR(50),
   fuel_capacity DECIMAL(10, 2),
   fuel_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2),
   distance_traveled DECIMAL(10, 2),
   date_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumption (
    vehicle_id INT,
    fuel_type VARCHAR(255),
    fuel_amount DECIMAL,
    mileage INT,
    date_recorded DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  trip_date DATE,
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255),
  distance_travelled DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  fuel_date DATE,
  fuel_quantity DECIMAL,
  fuel_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  trip_id INT,
  fuel_efficiency DECIMAL,
  emissions DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumptionDataForCars (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_brand VARCHAR(50),
    car_model VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_type VARCHAR(20),
    fuel_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    mileage DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumptionDataForBikes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bike_brand VARCHAR(50),
    bike_model VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_type VARCHAR(20),
    fuel_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    mileage DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumptionDataForPlanes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plane_manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    plane_model VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_type VARCHAR(20),
    fuel_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    distance_travelled DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumptionDataForShips (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ship_name VARCHAR(50),
    ship_type VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_type VARCHAR(20),
    fuel_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    distance_travelled DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumptionDataForTrains (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_company VARCHAR(50),
    train_model VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_type VARCHAR(20),
    fuel_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    distance_travelled DECIMAL(10,2)
);
